definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
ridge between fields/row of crops/grave mound
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: V. How can Anti-monopoly Law Regulate the Court of Law for Abuse of Power?
sentences.chinese: 反壟斷法如何規制法院權力濫用？

sentences.english: At present, our country has not an intact and unified antimonopoly law.
sentences.chinese: 在當前，我國沒有一部完整統一的反壟斷法出臺。

sentences.english: There are both conflicts and coherence between the two laws.
sentences.chinese: 反壟斷法和價格法之間既存在着衝突也存在協調關係。

sentences.english: National monopoly is one of the regulated objects of international anti-monopoly law.
sentences.chinese: 國家壟斷是國際反壟斷法的重要調整對象之一。

sentences.english: China’s antitrust law took effect in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 中國反壟斷法於2008年正式生效。

sentences.english: Anti-monopoly act is mainly related to competition and monopoly.
sentences.chinese: 反壟斷法是關於競爭與壟斷及其相互關係的法律規範。

sentences.english: The move is designed to avert legal action by the European Union for violating its anti-monopoly rules.
sentences.chinese: 此舉是爲了避免歐盟對其違犯反壟斷法採取法律行動。

sentences.english: And the Anti-Trust Law should aim to Microsoft at first.
sentences.chinese: 而且反壟斷法應該首先針對微軟。

sentences.english: It even thought a new anti-monopoly law in China would work in its favor.
sentences.chinese: 即便是在中國新的反壟斷法下面看，也是對它有利的。

sentences.english: Chapter two discusses the justifiability of Antimonopoly regulatory law for abuse of IPRs.
sentences.chinese: 第二章提出反壟斷法規制知識產權濫用的正當性命題。

sentences.english: The regulation of enterprises merger is an important part of Anti-monopoly Law.
sentences.chinese: 對企業合併進行規制是反壟斷法的重要內容之一。

sentences.english: The Microsoft Corporation was charged with violations of anti-monopoly laws.
sentences.chinese: 微軟公司被指控違反反壟斷法。

sentences.english: Merger regulation system has been an important part of the anti-monopoly law.
sentences.chinese: 企業合併控制制度一直是各國反壟斷法中的重要內容。

sentences.english: In the field of anti-monopoly law, enterprise combinations have different connotations and types.
sentences.chinese: 在反壟斷法領域內，企業合併具有不同的含義和種類。

sentences.english: Set up the competitive rules of public enterprises by passing the anti - monopoly law.
sentences.chinese: 及早出臺反壟斷法，確立公用企業的競爭規則。

sentences.english: In the old days, antitrust laws kept monopolies from buying potential competitors.
sentences.chinese: 過去，反壟斷法禁止壟斷大戶收購其潛在競爭者。
